post.description:
Generate a verification code and send it to the user's email.

Each user can have only one active verification code at a time.
If a user requests a new code, any existing active codes are deactivated.

Verify a user's email using the provided verification code.

If the code is valid and not expired, the user's email is marked as verified.

schema.title: Response Verify Code Api Verification Verify Post

post.description:

post.description:
Get aggregated statistics for inferences within a date range.

This endpoint provides various statistics about inferences including:
- Total number of inferences
- Number of successful inferences
- Number of failed inferences
- Count of unique diseases detected
- Average confidence level
- Breakdown of inference statuses

schema.title: Response Get Inference Aggregates Api Inferences Aggregates Post

UserResponseModel.title: UserResponseModel
UserResponseModel.description:
UserResponseModel represents the response schema for user data in the API.

Attributes:
    id (UUID): The unique identifier of the user.
    email (str): The email address of the user.
    is_active (bool): Indicates whether the user's account is active.
    is_verified (bool): Indicates whether the user's email has been verified.
    is_superuser (bool): Indicates whether the user has superuser privileges.

UserReviewCreate.title: UserReviewCreate
UserReviewCreate.description: Model for creating a user review.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: The date and time the review was created.

user_id.title: User ID
user_id.description: The ID of the user who created the review.

UserReviewRead.title: UserReviewRead
UserReviewRead.description: Model for reading a user review.

UserReviewUpdate.title: UserReviewUpdate
UserReviewUpdate.description: Model for updating a user review.

UserRoleAssign.title: UserRoleAssign
UserRoleAssign.description: Schema for assigning a new role to user.

UserUpdate.title: UserUpdate
UserUpdate.description:
UserUpdate represents the schema for updating user data in the API.

Attributes:
    email (Optional[str]): The email address of the user.
    first_name (Optional[str]): The first name of the user.
    last_name (Optional[str]): The last name of the user.
    phone_number (Optional[str]): The phone number of the user.
    avatar (Optional[str]): The avatar key/path for the user.
